From: "Jason Rogers" <jason.rogers@...>


    > Hi ,
    >      I want to know how you can use junit for testing 
    > java programs 
    > which involve database updates.
    > 
    >      I have a method which does multiple updates using a stored 
    > procedure.How do i test it using Junit ?.
    > 
    >       Can somebody please help ?
    > 
    > Satish

I would first recommend searching for this in the archives of this list.
This topic has been discussed at great length.  You can also search the
archives of the Extreme Programming list
<http://groups.yahoo.com/group/extremeprogramming>  There are many threads
there dedicated to the topic of testing programs that use any external
support mechanism (database being the most common, but you could apply it to
RMI, CORBA, JNI, etc.).

The best advice I can give at a high level is architect to the use of Mock
Objects.  If your design cannot support that now, it is probably not a
_very_ flexible design.  Flexibility is good, in most cases :)
subject: RE: [junit] Junit Newbie
